column5: Got out on Erie yesterday for a couple of hours with my dad and one of his friends.  Weather could not have been better with only a slight breeze and partly cloudy skies.  The main action for smallies came off of 8-12 foot breaks with deeper water around.  The best baits for the day were Phenix Tubes, Jackall jerkbaits and also the new One Knocker crankbait.  We caught well over 30 fish with the biggest ones between 3-4lbs besides 1 good size sheephead LOL.  Nothing huge but a great time out there.  Here are a couple of pics
Some real beauties there Blake. Good work.
If those first 2 pics are of your Dad......  I dont think Ive seen anyone look that happy in a long time.  The power of fishing!
BIG ERIE SMALLIES !!!!!! and man are they ever getting fat....feeding on all those ROUND GOBIES..  ..its their new favourite food...nice pics as well...cheers
Great work where abouts were you ?? I thought i saw you over by the hydro factory hot water out.. Mabey not!!
I AM SHOCKED!!!! Only one sheephead?? (at least its a big grunter at that)  nice photos
It is always fun to get out with my dad.  He got me into fishing when I was really young and now to be able to take him fishing feels great and the memories are priceless.
